name: PromptDJ MIDI
description: Control real time music with a MIDI controller.
prompt: A luxury lofi house track inspired by crystalline ambient textures. Slow to moderate tempo (≈85 BPM). Deep warm house beat with soft vinyl-style crackle, layered with shimmering glassy synth pads and bell-like tones. Melody is simple and continuous, slightly melancholic but polished, reflecting art-deco elegance. Wide stereo field with lush reverb, clean production. Mood: sophisticated, reflective, luxurious — like walking through an art-deco showroom filled with crystal, brass, and dark wood.
